title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8104.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8104.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 417. Route 417 from US Route 219 (City of Salamanca) to Route 305 in the City of

Salamanca, City of Olean, Towns of Allegany, Olean, Carrollton and Portville, and the Villages of Allegany, Portville, and Allegany Indian

Reservation. (b) [Eff. until July
11, 2001, see also subd. (b) below.] Route 98. Route 98 between the

Cattaraugus-Wyoming county line and Route 243. (b) [Eff. July 11, 2001, see also subd. (b)
above.] [Repealed]
(c) [Eff. until

Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (c) below.] US Route 219. Route US 219 between
the Erie-Cattaraugus county line and Route 417 in the Towns of Ashford, Ellicottville, Great Valley and the Village of Ellicottville and the City of

Salamanca. (c) [Eff. Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (c) above.] Route 243. Route 243 between Route 98 and the

Cattaraugus-Allegany county line. (d) [Eff. until July 11, 2001, see also subd. (d) below.] Route 417. Route 417 between West Five Mile Road and Business Route
219 in the Towns of Carrollton, Allegany and the Allegany Indian

Reservation. (d) [Eff. July 11, 2001, see also subd. (d) above.] [Repealed]
(e) Route 17. Route 17, the Southern Tier

Expressway, between the Chautauqua-Cattaraugus county line and exit 24 (West

Five Mile Road) in the Towns of Randolph, Coldspring, Carrollton, Allegany, Village of Randolph, City of Salamanca and the Allegany Indian

Reservation. (f) Route 219. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 219 between exit 23 of Route 17, the Southern Tier Expressway, and the New York-Pennsylvania state line in the

Town of Carrollton, Village of Limestone and the Allegany Indian

Reservation. (g) Route 305. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 305 between Route 417 and the New

York - Pennsylvania state line, in the Village of Portville and Town of

Portville. (h) Business Route 219. Business Route 219 between Route 417 and exit 23 (Route 219) of Route 17, the

Southern Tier Expressway, in the Town of Carrollton and the Allegany Indian

Reservation. (i) Route 62. Route 62
between the Erie-Cattaraugus county line and Route 322, in the Village of

Gowanda and the Towns of Persia and Dayton. (j) Route 322. Route 322 between Route 62 and
the Cattaraugus-Chautauqua county line in the Town of Dayton and the Village of

South Dayton. (k) Route 16. Route
16 between Route 417 and the New York-Pennsylvania state line in the City of

Olean and Town of Olean and Alleghany. (l) Roue 16. Route 16 between the

Erie-Cattaraugus county line and exit 26 of the Southern Tier Expressway, in
the Towns of Yorkshire, Machias, Farmersville, Franklinville, Ischua, Hinsdale
and Olean and the Villages of Delevant and Franklinville and the City of

Olean. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8104.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
